defined_text = {
	name = GetNameRuDat

##### Cosmetic Tag (1) + Country Tag (2) + Ideology + Subject	430 #####
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = ITA
			has_cosmetic_tag = gojjam
			has_government = fascism
		}
		localization_key = gojjam_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Dat
	}
	text = {

defined_text = {
	name = GetNameRuAcc

##### Cosmetic Tag (1) + Country Tag (2) + Ideology + Subject	430 #####
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = ITA
			has_cosmetic_tag = gojjam
			has_government = fascism
		}
		localization_key = gojjam_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Acc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = SOV
			has_cosmetic_tag = mountainous_republics_unified
			has_government = communism
		}
		localization_key = mountainous_republics_unified_SOV_communism_subject_RU_Acc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = ITA
			has_cosmetic_tag = BOS_without_HRZ
			has_government = fascism
		}
		localization_key = BOS_without_HRZ_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Acc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = ITA
			has_cosmetic_tag = jimma
			has_government = fascism

defined_text = {
	name = GetNameRuInst

##### Cosmetic Tag (1) + Country Tag (2) + Ideology + Subject	430 #####
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = ITA
			has_cosmetic_tag = gojjam
			has_government = fascism
		}
		localization_key = gojjam_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Inst
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = SOV
			has_cosmetic_tag = mountainous_republics_unified
			has_government = communism
		}
		localization_key = mountainous_republics_unified_SOV_communism_subject_RU_Inst
	}
	text = {

			is_subject_of = ITA

		}
		localization_key = BOS_without_HRZ_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Inst

			has_cosmetic_tag = jimma

		}
		localization_key = jimma_ITA_fascism_subject_RU_Inst
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			is_subject_of = SOV
			has_cosmetic_tag = idel_ural
			has_government = communism
		}
		localization_key = idel_ural_SOV_communism_subject_RU_Inst
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPA
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = fascism
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPA
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = neutrality
				}

##### Country Tag (1) + Cosmetic Tag (2) + Ideology + Subject	190 #####
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = AOI
			has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_neutrality
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = yes
		}

	text = {
		trigger = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						original_tag = ABK
						has_government = communism
				}
					AND = {
						original_tag = ABK
						has_government = democratic
				}
					AND = {
						original_tag = ABK
						has_government = fascism
				}
					AND = {
						original_tag = ABK
						has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ABK_neutrality_ADJ_RU_lower

			original_tag = AOI

defined_text = {
	name = GetAdjRuEnd

##### Cosmetic Tag (1) + Country Tag (2) + Ideology + Subject	430 #####
	text = {
		trigger = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPA
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = fascism
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPA
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = neutrality
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPR
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = fascism
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SPR
						has_cosmetic_tag = MEX_cristero
						has_government = neutrality
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = ITA

						has_government = fascism
				}

						has_government = fascism
				}
					AND = {

						has_government = communism
				}
					AND = {

				}

						is_subject_of = SOV

				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SOV

						has_government = communism
				}
					AND = {
						is_subject_of = SOV

				}
					AND = {

						has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = RU_Adj_Ending_Aya
	}

				}

						original_tag = KEN

						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_colony
				}
					AND = {
						original_tag = LBA

						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_colony
				}
					AND = {
						original_tag = ZIM
						is_subject_of = ENG
						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_colony
				}
					AND = {

						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_dominion
				}
					AND = {
